name: nukkad-fullstack
description: Nukkad Local Vibe Shop - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client" "npm run seed-deals" "npm run update-discounts"  "npm run landing"
scripts.build: npm run landing-build && npm run server-build && npm run client-build
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../nukkad-local-vibe-shop-main && npm install && cd ../customer && npm install
